attributes.action: no longer give aid to Sudan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There should be no more government aid for Sudan.

There should be negotiation of a charter with other countries which enshrines basic human rights, irrespective of religious laws. Countries who refuse to sign up to it will not qualify for any aid.  Such countries must become civilised.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
